text: tena karata vadhare atyacari bijo kona che, jene tena palanaharani ayato dvara sikhamana apavamam ave, to pana modhum pheravi le ane je kami tena hatha vade karela karmone agala mokali rakhya che tene te bhuli jaya, ni:Sanka ame temana hrdayo para parada nakhi didha che ke te tene (na) samaje ane temana kanamam ada che, bhalene tame te lokone satya marga tarapha bolavata raho, parantu te'o kyareya satya marga nahim pame
